title: Bewitiching Taliyah Concept
body:
I had an idea for Bewitching Taliyah, this was my first little rough draft of it and I'd really like to make a full concept one day. 

>https://imgur.com/a/qzm0j7w

Q- She pulls up a pumpkin and her throwing rocks are smashed pumpkin bits. 
W- It's a little caldron stuck in the ground and as it pushes the champ/minions up it shoots up the liquids inside. 
E- Jack-O-Lanterns with different types of faces on the ground and as they "erupt" they smash like regular pumpkins would and/or shoot out candy.
R- More Jack-O-Lantern but wild and tangled with vines. Instead of Taliyah riding the wave, she rides a broom stick

What I had in mind with this rough draft was maybe she's the student of all the current witches (Trist, Morg, Janna, etc.) learning the ways of becoming a witch. Every lesson completed she earns a charm from each teacher (the little charms on her cape) and eventually her own hat that will ~~hopefully~~ fit her once she passes all the tests.

I'd love some feedback on the outfit because I was a little lost lol

replies.body:
Your vision for all the new spell effects and themes are super fun and flavorful!

Maybe she can ride the broom whenever her wall-riding passive kicks in?

Someone on Twitter suggested her Q is a hex and it's like a fire. Definitely gonna try it out whenever I get to make a full concept!

And that would be super cute! Gives her more use of the broom stick other than just her ult
